members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Trouve puis execute une commande
l'ensemble des arguments le logger le tunnel le jeton de session true si la commande a été trouvée -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: T:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.CHECK_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Check parameters!.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.CLIENT_STARTED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Client started, press enter key to exit....

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.CLIENT_TITLE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to -=[ BoutDuTunnel Client v{0} - Sebastien LEBRETON ]=-.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.CONNECTION_FAILED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to connect to server (check proxy settings).

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.CURRENT_SID
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Current Session-id (Sid): {0}.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.FORWARD_CANCELED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Port {0} already in use, disabling forward to {1}:{2}.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.FORWARDING
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Forwarding {0}:{1} to {2}:{3}.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.HELP_HELP
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Display help.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.INPUT_PROXY_DOMAIN
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enter domain: .

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.INPUT_PROXY_PASSWORD
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enter password (hidden): .

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.INPUT_PROXY_USERNAME
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enter username: .

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.INVALID_PORT
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Port number must be set between {0} and {1}.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.INVALID_SOCKS_HANDSHAKE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid handshake with socks handler.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.KILL_CONNECTION_HELP
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Kill an existing connection, given his sid and cid.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.KILL_SESSION_HELP
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Kill an existing session, given his sid.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.MONITOR_HELP
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Display all sessions and connections.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.NO_VALID_SOCKS_HANDLER
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No valid socks handler found.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.NOT_USING_PROXY
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Direct connexion without proxy.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.PROXY_AUTH_REQUESTED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Proxy authentication requested.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS_BIND_UNSUPPORTED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Socks bind request unsupported.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS_SERVER_DISABLED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Port {0} already in use, disabling Socks server.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS_SERVER_STARTED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Socks server listening to {0}:{1}.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS4_REQUEST_HANDLED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Socks4 request handled.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS4A_REQUEST_HANDLED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Socks4A request handled.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS5_ADDRESS_TYPE_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unknown address type in Socks5 request.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS5_BAD_VERSION
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Bad Socks5 version.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS5_IPV6_UNSUPPORTED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unsupported IPV6 addresses in Socks5 request.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS5_MALFORMED_METHOD_ENUM
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Malformed method enumeration in Socks5 request.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS5_NO_AUTHENTICATION_SUPPORTED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No Socks5 authentication supported.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS5_REQUEST_HANDLED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Socks5 request handled.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS5_UDP_UNSUPPORTED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to UDP unsupported in Socks5 request.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.SOCKS5_UNKNOWN_COMMAND
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unknown command in Socks5 request.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.TCP_SERVER_DISABLED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Port {0} already in use, disabling TCP server.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.USING_PROXY
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Using proxy: {0}.

member.name: P:Bdt.Client.Resources.Strings.VERSION_MISMATCH
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Version mismatch between client and server.

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Saisie des informations d'authentification sur le proxy
le protocol IProxyCompatible à alterer pour permettre les essais multiples -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Constructeur
port local côté client bind sur toutes les ip/ip locale port distant côté serveur adresse côté serveur tunnel de communication session-id -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Constructeur
le socket client pour la communication locale le tunnel pour la communication distante le session-id l'adresse distante de connexion le port distant de connexion -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Calcule le temps d'attente nécessaire entre deux traitements
l'attente entre pollings ajustement (durée du dernier aller-retour
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
